statements: DELETE FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE pile_id = 1 AND pH_level < 5.0;
DELETE FROM pH_adjustment WHERE adjustment_reason = 'Too acidic';
DELETE FROM compost_pile WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Backyard';
DELETE FROM pH_adjustment WHERE compost_pile_id = 5 AND date_adjusted < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compost_pile_logs WHERE action = 'Turned' AND pile_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM compost_piles WHERE location = 'Backyard' AND temperature > 50.0;
DELETE FROM adjustments WHERE compost_pile_id IN (SELECT id FROM compost_piles WHERE pH_level > 7);
